name: calendar-bot
description: Bot de slack que anuncia eventos usando el calendario de meetups

scripts.deploy: now -e APP_NAME=$APP_NAME -e BIRTHDAYS_SPREADSHEET_ID=$BIRTHDAYS_SPREADSHEET_ID -e BIRTHDAYS_WORKSHEET_ID=$BIRTHDAYS_WORKSHEET_ID -e BOTS_PATH=$BOTS_PATH -e CALENDAR_API_URL=$CALENDAR_API_URL -e CHANNEL=$CHANNEL -e INSTANCE_NAME=$INSTANCE_NAME -e PASSPHRASE=$PASSPHRASE -e SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL=$SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL --token $NOW_TOKEN

author: durancristhian@gmail.com
